p.s: The informative text Hope of escape lost in translation written by Zia Haider Rahman publictedpublished on the 17th December 2016 is about the big translation problem and the interpreting for British residents.
The author thinkthinks it is a big problem that many people don't want to learn englishEnglish.
A lot of them think probably that they don't have to learn it because of the translating.
Another problem is that the immigrant community thinkthinks that they don't have to integrate because they maybe think they can use the translating and they don't have to learn the language.
Zia Haider Rahman also said that the financial costcosts are bad enough (l. 2) that's why it would be a big problem if everyone use the translating.
